Geocam Viewer DepthAnything Demo

This standalone page loads the custom <geocam-viewer> element and automatically wires up the Depth Anything v2 overlay plugin. Enter and validate an hf_… access token before any imagery streams in. Once the token is accepted, use the on-screen buttons—or the ← and → keys—to step through the sample drive; the depth overlay reruns for each frame.

Tip: Validate your Hugging Face token first—the depth panel will confirm when authorization is active. After each frame finishes loading, the overlay recomputes automatically; use the left/right arrow keys to step through the drive and download the refreshed grayscale depth map at any time.

Works out of the box on GitHub Pages: drop this repository at the root of a static host and visit /index.html. For local testing, run npm install followed by npm run build, then open this file directly or serve it with npx http-server .
